title: Five reasons to watch the OPL this weekend

replies.body: I am actually so hyped for the live audience games, it will definitely help better prepare the players. We could probably get to talk to the players more before and after games.
Why watch OPL when you can Watch LCK or NA LCS or EU LCS or LPL but am intrested on our IWCI this year{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
So, just gonna watch the Cricket instead, or play league
